body_html:
OK now I know why: this PR got (accidentally I think) reverted in the following commit: [
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/bfcfad55b7b3fa4a1093fa748d4241f9457b2a84#diff-455a4c7f8e22d7c514e8c2caa27506c5

I will send another PR to update the bazel-toolchain's pin for the 0.15.0 config release

body:
OK now I know why: this PR got (accidentally I think) reverted in the following commit: [
